channel.title: Virtualization & VMware :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: Note As of 2024, VMWare Workstation and VMWare Fusion are free for personal and academic use. You can download them directly from the VMWare website. Resources Slides Virtualization on Wikipedia Virtualization Whitepaper from Broadcom Download Workstation Download Fusion Video Script In this class, we will be making heavy use of virtualization software to allow us to run multiple operating systems simultaneously on the same computer. This video provides a quick overview of what virtualization is and how it works.
